0.1.name: wordpress/kanpress
0.1.description:
Kanpress brings Kanban management methodology to the publishing world. It provides enhanced management for magazines, newspapers and blogs through a workflow where posts move along different states.

Total integration · Kanpress manages post creation in your site with your current users and categories.

Traceability · Easily visualize when a task was assigned, processed or closed, and by who.

Private · Kanpress is used from Wordpress desktop and it doesn't change nothing about aspect or functionallity of your site.

**Available in English, Español, Galego, Deutsch (thanks J. O. Rüdiger), Italiano (thanks Marco Rossi) and Türk (thanks Enes Ünal)

More info on Kanpress homepage.
